name: Calendar 2014
description: We are proud to say that every calendar sold will come with a Â£1 donation to Wheels 4 Life the charity founded by Hans Rey and his wife Carmen to provide free bicycles to transform the lives of people in third world countries. So not only will you have some cracking pictures of the team for your wall you'll be supporting a great cause.

name: Team Trucker Hat
description:
Classic fit adjustable snap back trucker hat

3D icon logo on center front and logo screen on under visor

Rear flag label and GT / Atherton Racing logo on side panels

60% Cotton
60% Nylon

name: Team Race Jersey 2013
description:
Engineered chassis built of moisture wicking materials.

Strategically placed mesh panels.

Lighter weight and better functioning garment with tailored fit.

Increased coverage with custom collar design.

Elimination of bunching and forearm discomfort with cuffless sleeves.

Long tail remains tucked in with the extra material.

description:

XS is 45 " chest, 29 " from neck to hem
Hooded zip up fleece

Kangaroo pockets with media storage
    
Contrast drawcord
  
60/40 COTTON/POLY FLEECE 280G

name: SALE: 40% off Atherton DH / 4X microfibre saddle, hollow titanium rails
description:
MICROFIBRE SADDLE

Designed for and developed by the Atherton Racing Team, these components have been designed to perform in the most extreme environments

Perfectly suited to downhill and 4X racing thanks to its compact design, the Atherton saddle allows plenty of manoverability and bike control

Curved tail profile allows quick and easy transition on and off the back off the saddle

Strong and lightweight titanium rails with handy position indicators

Light foam padding provides comfort without adding weight

Kevlar protection on the nose and corners increase durability

Microfiber saddle cover is durable and lightweight

Weight 215 grams

name: Sale : 40% OFF Atherton DH seatpost
description:
SEATPOST

Designed for and developed by the Atherton Racing Team, these components have been designed to perform in the most extreme environments

Solid yet lightweight downhill seatpost using a 3D forged shaft and CNC machined head from 7050 alloy

7050 alloy is made by a 2-stage heat treatment process, the result is strong and light component with excellent resistance to stress-corrosion and cracking

Machined compact cone head design offers plenty of rotational and fore-aft adjustment while being strong and light5 mm Allen key bolt with M6 thread for secure installation and minimum tool requirement

Durable hard anodized finish

Laser etched logo graphics

In-line design

Short 250 mm length keeps weight to a minimum

Handy height-indicator on the rear of the shaft for quick setup

Weight 225 grams

name: SALE: 40% OFF Atherton oversize 31.8 mm DH riser bar - 20mm or 50 mm rise
description:
Designed for and developed by the Atherton Racing Team, these components have been designed to perform in the most extreme environments
Made from 7075 aluminium, a high strength aluminium alloy commonly used in the aircraft industry, it is the ideal material to produce this lightweight, strong and rigid handlebar
Oversized 31.8 mm clamp diameter reduces unwanted flex under high load by increasing strength and rigidity
745 mm width
3 degree upsweep, 7 degree backsweep
50 mm rise
Stem centralising markers
Durable polished and anodized finish
Laser etched logo graphics
Cutting indications from 705 to 745 mm
Weight 322 grams

name: SALE:  40% off Atherton  MOUNTS direct/ahead versions
description:
STEM

Designed for and developed by the Atherton Racing Team, these components have been designed to perform in the most extreme environments

Solid yet lightweight downhill racing stem, fully CNC machined from 7050 alloy offering precise steering control while riding

7050 alloy is made by a 2-stage heat treatment process, the result is a strong and light component with an excellent resistance to stress-corrosion and cracking

Curved and compact design helps prevent knee injury

Secure, wide four bolt front clamp for increased lateral rigidity with wide bars

Oversized 31.8 mm clamp diameter reduces unwanted flex under high load by increasing strength and rigidity

5 mm Allen key bolts with M6 thread across range for secure installation and minimum tool requirement

Durable hard anodized finish

Laser etched logos graphics

Stem angle 0 degrees

Low 33.5 mm stack height

For 1-1/8 inch fork steerers

Weight 160 grams
